channel.title: [508][IP Changer] Customizable Client - Models/Sprites (RELEASE)
channel.description:
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [center]----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center] [center][size=18pt][b]Customizable IP Changer Client[/b][/size][/center] [center]----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center] --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b][size=12pt][i]Features:[/i][/size][/b] [b]This Client Is A Customizable 508 IP Changer That You Can Add Models And Sprites To[/b]
[b][size=12pt][i]Contains:[/i][/size][/b] [b]Sprite Dump (Folder With Sprite Images, Like Bounty Hunter Icons Etc.) , Sprite Compiler , Client , READ ME's[/b]
[center]-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]
[center][b][size=13pt]Client Download:[/size] [/b][/center] [center][url=http://www.mediafire.com/?ynrmqzkhmdt]http://www.mediafire.com/?ynrmqzkhmdt[/url][/center]
[center]-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]
[center][b][size=13pt]Credits[/size][/b][/center] [left][b]- Mad Turnip / Laz : 5% - For His Tutorial and Sprite Dump And Compiler[/b][/left] [left][b]- Lurd Layton : 10% - For One Edited File That I Used From His Client[/b][/left] [left][b]- Original Client Creator : 65% - For The Original Client That I Added On Too [left][b]- Me : 20% - For Putting This Together And Creating A Model And Sprite Editable IP Changer[/b][/left]
[center]-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center] --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[center][b][size=13pt]Some Pictures[/size] [/b][/center]
[center][b]This Picture Is Just Showing That You CAN Put Custom Sprites Into The Client[/b][/center] [center][b]Note: This Client Originaly Did Not Have The "CamScapePK" Logos Or The Owner Crown.[/b][/center] [img]http://img35.imageshack.us/img35/5339/fightpits.png[/img] [img]http://img35.imageshack.us/img35/7290/clientlogin.png[/img]

item.title: [508][IP Changer] Customizable Client - Models/Sprites (RELEASE)
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“bo 3wais, post:52, topic:306239”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=402426.msg2983072#msg2983072 date=1254746123]
You didnt make anything… “making” would be creating your own sprite handler and sprite editors, then making your own model grabbers and loaders. We all know all you did was follow tuts. Thats not making anything. The people that created the tuts are the real ones that “made” your client.
[/quote]your a moron, he folowed tuts, so what? he only gave himself 20% thats even less than it should be, ok so wut? would u rather read the tuts and waste time or just download it? this guy is only helping -.- and u say hes not “making” anything, so if some1 buys bread and cheese and makes a sandwich he didnt “make” it? did the factory that baked the bread make it? so shut it[/quote]You’re a moron… this happened in October of last year. And then he had himself with 80% of the credits…

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

licorish55:

Why couldn’t you just stop at he didn’t have correct credits so thats why you flamed. No, you have to instigate all the damn time and add your cocky little, And if you could read you would see this. blah blah fucking blah. You have 0 respect for anyones work at all.

I love how many assumptions you make. I did not flame because he did not have correct credits. I stopped flaming when he gave credits to the correct people however. I respect many people work. You just wouldn’t know good work if it stepped on your toe. I respect the people that made the tutorials this person followed, but I have no reason to respect someone that can only read and FOLLOW tutorials. I have even made a few tutorials myself. You have so far 1/2 of your posts have been flame or something about getting around an anti-leech. I actually counted.

item.title: [508][IP Changer] Customizable Client - Models/Sprites (RELEASE)
item.dc:creator: @CameronClark CameronClark
item.description:
@CameronClark wrote:

[quote=“Destruction, post:32, topic:306239”][quote author=CameronClark link=topic=402426.msg2987449#msg2987449 date=1255098526]

Quick question, how do I make the sprites transparent when I make new sprites? I know how to do it but it just isn’t working. Its just white background and then the image. Any help? And also, how do I change the size of the sprites so I can make them bigger so it doesn’t crash?

Wow I had the same problem mate, but not to worry!! I found a cure. Lol. AiPro, stands for Art Icons Professional which you can download from here: http://www.aha-soft.com/articons/index.htm

There is a transparency tool in this program and I’m sure you just click your pen, paint brush, flood fill etc and hold down the right click and paint where you want it transparent/see through.

Btw, I didn’t make the AiPro program. And all credit to the creators of that. ;D
[/quote]

Oh my god! Thanks! It works amazingly! I love this program! It’s awesome :P[/quote]
Oh, haha Great glad you found this helpful

Read full topic

[/quote]
Wow I had the same problem mate, but not to worry!! I found a cure. Lol. AiPro, stands for Art Icons Professional which you can download from here: http://www.aha-soft.com/articons/index.htm

There is a transparency tool in this program and I’m sure you just click your pen, paint brush, flood fill etc and hold down the right click and paint where you want it transparent/see through.

Btw, I didn’t make the AiPro program. And all credit to the creators of that. ;D[/quote]

Wow can you plz STFU, leave, and dont come back to this thread. You think your soo… good that you can “make your own server…” “BEST 508 EVER” Yea right. Stop thinking your all that and when other people post helpful stuff dont feel jelous and have to flame… Just suck it up and get over it.
[/quote]

You can’t tell him to shut the fuck up, you don’t MoparScape and he doesn’t belong to you, therefore you have no control over him. He IS good, his server probably IS the best 508 ever. Finally, please give me three reasons why would he be jealous of this?

I’m not flaming or anything, but it seems to be everyone vs David when he actually does have a point.[/quote]
Yes I have in mind that he probly was right about some stuff and I have changed the credits to what I think is right.
